title: Gifting Chromas bugged?
body: It appears that you can't gift chromas at all. I tried doing it and i had friends as well that couldn't gift me the Battle Regalia Poppy chromas. Riot support told me that it appears to be a bug and to post on the forums.

replies.body:
Heya! 

Bundles can't be gifted, due to the store functionality, unfortunately, and the chromas fall into the 'bundle' category. D:
Does that basically mean that chroma gifting is no more? ( both the bundle and single chroma ) it was available on release so what's the reason for the sudden undocumented disabling?
I know single chromas were available for gifting, I'm not sure if the new store has offered functionality for bundled chromas at the moment.

Sadly single chromas can't be gifted either, and op was most likely interested in that ( because of the sale ) , and i am still using the old client ( new client sadly reduces my fps by too much ) , so is this basically an unknown bug? not a confirmed removal?

I'm honestly not sure on that one, I only make the content. D: I would, however, be happy to run over to the store team tomorrow and talk to them about it, and if it's not intended, have them log the issue! :)
Alright a big thanks for the trouble! updating for the new patch atm gonna see if its already solved once i log in x)
Sadly it's not working afterall, been over a month now if i am not wrong, nobody else noticed this problem?
Hi! Sorry for the delay here. It's currently intended that chromas aren't giftable. :c

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Jxx6j3B1,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-19T17:54:02.405+0000)
>
> Hi! Sorry for the delay here. It's currently intended that chromas aren't giftable. :c

Why though? In what world does that need to be the case? They cost rp and you can buy everything else that uses rp to buy friends something. Why should it matter where the rp comes from for a cosmetic item that is NO different from a regular skin? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Has there been any changes to that yet? Or maybe perhaps just a date when it will become giftable again?

No change at the moment; we're still working on getting core features into the new client. The full list can be found [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/future-plans-client), but it doesn't look like gifting chromas is prioritized at the moment, as this would be a system overhaul with the store because the functionality is that you can't gift bundles period, and that's what chromas are classified as. :c As for gifting individual chromas, I'm not sure what the case may be at this time.
Are there any reasons why the chromas are not currently giftable?
Even when it's an individual chroma?
This is happening to me as well, it seems like the chromas aren't showing up at all.
